reviewText: Wonderful stop-motion animated film which holds up equally well for adults as well as children. Highly detailed sets and characters, catchy songs and a nice story make this film a delight for all the senses.

I saw this originally when my son was young as part of the "Long Ago Far Away" Series hosted by James Earl Jones. There are several that I remember being quite good but they are hard to find and of course they don't include the hosting by Mr. Jones.  But this is still a great upbeat movie about a boy elephant and his Uncle who develope a special bond when the boys parents are lost at sea.
